rules: Rule1: Under the condition that the participant oversleeps, if the participant is late to the conference, then the participant misses the keynote.
Rule2: If the participant checks the schedule, then the participant sees a conflict.
Rule3: Provided that the participant sees a conflict, the participant reviews the policy.

Rule4: Whenever the participant contacts the organizer, if it is not the case that having a ticket for the event implies presenting technology, then the participant does not get a refund for the ticket.
Rule5: If the participant reviews the policy, then the participant contacts the organizer.
Rule6: Under the condition that the participant has programming skill, if the participant does not present technology, then the participant attends the workshop.
Rule7: Provided that the participant has design skill, if the participant does not present technology, then the participant attends the workshop.
Rule8: The participant practices coding or the participant practices prototyping.
Rule9: Whenever the participant practices prototyping, the participant has design skill.
Rule10: If the participant studies algorithms, then if the participant practices coding, the participant has programming skill.
Rule11: The participant studies algorithms or the participant studies interfaces.
Rule12: Under the condition that the participant studies interfaces, if the participant practices coding, then the participant has programming skill.
Rule13: Provided that the participant is distracted, the participant is late to the conference.
Rule14: Whenever it is not the case that having a ticket for the event implies presenting technology, the participant gets a refund for the ticket.
Rule15: Under the condition that it is not the case that the participant drinks alcohol or presents technology, the participant is distracted.
facts: Fact2: The participant has a ticket for the event.
Fact3: The participant checks the schedule.
Fact4: It is not the case that the participant attends the workshop.
Fact5: The participant does not miss the keynote.
Fact6: The participant does not drink alcohol.
